title: HandyList
description: Turns handwritten paper notes into digital shopping lists with GPT.

title: jdmcserver
description: A stripped down EC2 virtual machine capable of running a Minecraft server for 2 dollars a month, hosted in AWS.

title: PR Chrome Extension
description: Fun investigation into how chrome extensions run in the browser, this particular one uses a JavaScript worker service to poll for GitHub pipeline state changes and send a chrome desktop notification with a status icon and details of the pipeline.

title: CV
description: This page is actually a React/Webpack static site hosted on GitHub Pages. Feel free to suggest improvements or even open a Pull Request.
